article.title: Paper windows: interaction techniques for digital paper
article.author: Holman, David
Vertegaal, Roel
Altosaar, Mark
Troje, Nikolaus
Johns, Derek
article.abstract: In this paper, we present Paper Windows, a prototype windowing environment that simulates the use of digital paper displays. By projecting windows on physical paper, Paper Windows allows the capturing of physical affordances of paper in a digital world. The system uses paper as an input device by tracking its motion and shape with a Vicon Motion Capturing System. We discuss the design of a number of interaction techniques for manipulating information on paper displays.
